Key Match Events: Derek Hill had three hits and the second two-homer game of his career
Kyle Stowers had three hits and four RBI
Jesus Sanchez doubled and stole home
Garrett Conine doubled, Jones scored, Hilliard to third
Brian Tovar hit a sacrifice fly
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Coors Field
Others: Valente Bellozo started for the Marlins, Bradley Blalock started for the Rockies
The Marlins won 12-8, earning a split of the four-game series
